name: MeditationTime
0:
”Alexa, open meditation time”

skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: meditation time
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Meditation Time is the Alexa skill that offers guided meditation sessions whenever you need them. With over 10 different meditations to choose from, featuring a variety of calming voices and soothing background sounds, this skill is designed to help both your body and mind unwind.

Meditation sessions are available in different lengths: 10, 20, or 30 minutes.

Unlock Pro Features to enjoy:

• Professional-grade meditation voices
• A wide selection of background sounds perfect for your sessions
• Unlimited access with no restrictions
• Regularly updated meditation programs
• Full access to all session durations

We’d love to hear your feedback to keep improving and provide the best guided meditation experience.

Relax and enjoy!
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
